# Table S1. Syncom strains

```{r echo =F}
readr::read_rds("files_publication/syncom_membership.rds") %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(Syncom) %>% 
  dplyr::arrange(Genus) %>% 
  gt::gt() %>% 
  gt::as_latex()
```
